headline: How Investors Are Reacting To T. Rowe Price Group (TROW) November Outflows And Strategic Business Shift
summary: T. Rowe Price Group recently reported preliminary November assets under management of US$1.79 trillion, with US$8.00 billion in net outflows and a slight decline in assets, while also advancing product innovation and leadership changes across its global distribution and operations teams. These developments highlight how persistent client withdrawals, ongoing product expansion in active ETFs, and organizational reshaping could all influence the firm’s fee base and longer-term business...
